value.name: The Villager Who Was Abandoned, Was Picked Up by an Aristocrat and Awakened a Legendary Divine Skill
value.original_name: 捨てられていた村人、貴族に拾われ伝説の神スキルに目覚めた
value.overview: Follows Mateo, who is reincarnated as the grandson of an aristocrat. He learns to use ancient magic and hatch dragon eggs. The emperor hears of his magical power and checks it out, but he has a secret identity...
